attributes.action: Lets us hang the English flag out in pride
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets us hang the English flag out in pride. The government dose not let us hang our own flag our own country at the moment .I am her to object to this. We can hang the BRITSH flag out but we can not hang the English flag out on a pole like the Americans do. I am not a racist I just think we should hang are own flag out in pride.
We are aloud to hang the flag out on special occasions and out of a low window but not on a pole so every nows I am ENGLISH.
